name: team-graphics-library
title: Team Graphics Library
description: Quick access to team png assets
author: Shchekoldin

commands.name: search-assets
commands.title: Search Assets
commands.subtitle: Find and copy team graphics
commands.description: Quick access to team PNG assets - logos, icons, templates. Search by name and copy to clipboard.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
